idea-plugin.name: Agentic Copilot
idea-plugin.description:
Lightweight IntelliJ Platform plugin that embeds GitHub Copilot's agent capabilities directly into your IDE.

Features

  • AI-powered multi-step planning and execution via GitHub Copilot SDK
  • Rich context management with code selections and symbols
  • Visual plan tracking with real-time progress
  • Timeline view of agent reasoning and tool invocations
  • Git integration with Conventional Commits support
  • Smart code formatting and import optimization

Requirements

  • GitHub Copilot subscription (or BYOK configuration)
  • GitHub Copilot CLI installed (managed by plugin sidecar)
